doc:
DeWolf Hopper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DeWolf_Hopper 0 William DeWolf Hopper (March 30, 1858 – September 23, 1935) was an American actor, singer, comedian, and theatrical producer. A star of vaudeville and musical theater, he became best known for performing the popular baseball poem Casey at the Bat. William_DeWolf_Hopper ( March_30_,_1858 – September_23_,_1935 ) was an_American_actor , singer , comedian , and theatrical_producer . A_star of vaudeville and musical_theater , he became best_known for performing the_popular_baseball_poem_Casey at the_Bat .
